BasicInfo.short: Facebook is an online social networking service that enables its users to connect with friends and family as well as make new connections.

Products.name: Gameroom
Products.description: Gameroom is a desktop gaming platform for Windows personal computers.

news.title: Facebook officially announces Gameroom, its PC Steam competitor

Products.description: Build, grow, and monetize your app with Facebook.

Products.name: Facebook Marketplace
Products.description: Facebook Marketplace allows users to browse a relevancy-sorted feed of things to buy from people nearby and to sell their stuff online.

news.title: Facebook launches Marketplace, a friendlier Craigslist

Products.name: Network Connection Class
Products.description: Network Connection Class is an Android library that allows you to figure out the quality of the current user's internet connection.

news.title: Facebook's '2G Tuesdays' will let employees experience 2G speeds

Products.name: Lifestage
Products.description: Lifestage is an app that turns recorded video clips into a video profile that others can watch.
